Uses of Package
jade.content.abs

  • Packages that use jade.content.abs 
    Package Description
    jade.content

    This package and its sub-packages contain classes that support the user in creating and manipulating complex content expressions according to a given content language and ontology.
    jade.content.abs  
    jade.content.lang  
    jade.content.lang.leap  
    jade.content.lang.sl  
    jade.content.onto  
    jade.content.onto.basic  
    jade.content.schema  
    jade.content.schema.facets  
  • Classes in jade.content.abs used by jade.content 
    Class and Description
    AbsContentElement
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a generic content element expression.
  • Classes in jade.content.abs used by jade.content.abs 
    Class and Description
    AbsAggregate
    An abstract descriptor that can hold an aggregate entitiy expression.
    AbsConcept
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a concept expression.
    AbsContentElement
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a generic content element expression.
    AbsExtendedPrimitive
    An extended abstract descriptor that can hold a generic primitive types (eg. java.math.BigDecimal) not supported by AbsPrimitive.
    AbsObject
    The common ancestor of all abstract descriptors
    AbsObjectImpl
    Base class for all non-primitive abstract descriptor classes.
    AbsPredicate
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a predicate expression.
    AbsPrimitive
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a primitive expression.
    AbsPrimitiveSlotsHolder
    This class is not intended to be used by programmers.
    AbsTerm
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a term expression.
    AbsVariable
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a variable expression, i.e. an entity that is not known yet.
  • Classes in jade.content.abs used by jade.content.lang 
    Class and Description
    AbsContentElement
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a generic content element expression.
  • Classes in jade.content.abs used by jade.content.lang.leap 
    Class and Description
    AbsContentElement
    An abstract descriptor that can hold a generic content element expression.

    The common ancestor of all abstract descriptors
